name: App_Cisco_Audit_Logging
query:
SELECT
	strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S',om.DateTime) AS 'Creation date time',
    om.ObjectID,
    au.AttributeName,
    au.ValueOld,
    au.ValueNew,
    st.SystemName,
    st.TableName,
    at.Name,
    a.UserID,
    u.Name [User]
FROM
	Objects AS o
    INNER JOIN SystemTables st ON st.ID = o.SystemTableID
	INNER JOIN ObjectMutations AS om ON om.ObjectID=o.ID
    INNER JOIN Activities AS a ON a.ID = om.ActivityID
    INNER JOIN ActivityTypes AS at ON a.ActivityTypeID = at.ID
   	LEFT JOIN Users AS u ON u.ID = a.UserID
	INNER JOIN AttributeUpdates AS au ON om.ID = au.ObjectMutationID
	WHERE datetime(om.DateTime, 'localtime') > DATE(datetime(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'localtime'), '-90 days')
    AND (
      		( LOWER(st.SystemName) IN ('internal') AND LOWER(st.TableName) LIKE 'cisco%')
      		OR 
    		( LOWER(st.SystemName) IN (LOWER($SystemName_CUCM),LOWER($SystemName_Unity)) )
     	)
    ORDER BY om.DateTime DESC

params.name: SystemName_CUCM
params.description: Name of the CUCM System in NIM

params.name: SystemName_Unity
params.description: Name of the Unity System in NIM
